vecUnachieved.strDescription: You were defeated in battle. Gather your willpower and try again!

vecUnachieved.strName: There Are Too Many People In This Hallway
vecUnachieved.strDescription: You've amassed a battle party of four or more companions.
You've stayed healthy in Neverwinter by eating well, washing your hands and setting things on fire.
One hundred thousand pennies in your pocket.
There is a demon in Helm's Hold. Do you release it or restore the guardian spirit to its rightful place?
You unlocked a prestige class from Hordes of the Underdark.
You are five times more prestigious.
Your journey has taken you into the sleeping territory of the dead. You've raided three tombs of Lord Never and returned the artifacts found there to Oleff or Giles.
You trained yourself in multiple fields of battle. Beware the potential experience penalty!

data.strFullDescription:
Neverwinter Nights: Enhanced Edition adds all-new enhanced features to the content of Neverwinter Nights Diamond Edition.

Slink through the shadows as a deadly half-elven rogue, wield fearsome magics as a powerful gnomish sorcerer, vanquish your foes as an armor-clad dwarven paladin... whatever hero you create, incredible adventures await.

Discover magic, wonder, and danger at every turn on your own or with friends in these classic Dungeons & Dragons adventures.

[h2]Enhanced Features:[/h2]
[list][*][u]Improved Display[/u]: Your portrait, combat bar, inventory, and other UI elements adjust in size based on your chosen resolution including 1080p and 4k.
[*][u]Advanced Graphics Options[/u]: Pixel shaders and post-processing effects make for crisper, cleaner visuals. Enable contrast, vibrance, and depth of field options as preferred.
[*][u]Community Endorsed[/u]: Original developers have teamed with key members of the Neverwinter Nights community to curate important fan-requested improvements to support players, storytellers, and modders. 
[*][u]Backwards Compatibility[/u]: Works with save games, modules, and mods from the original Neverwinter Nights. A galaxy of community created content awaits.
[*][u]Restored Multiplayer[/u]: A completely rebuilt multiplayer system makes it easy to find online persistent worlds and game with friends
[*][u]More Modder Opportunities[/u]: Toolset quality-of-life improvements, shaders, filters, texture maps, and a new material systems allow creators to make amazing looking models and modules.[/list]

[h2]All the content of Neverwinter Nights Diamond Edition:[/h2]
[b]The original Neverwinter Nights campaign:[/b] Find yourself at the center of intrigue, betrayal, and dark magic in Neverwinter Nights. Journey through dangerous cities, monster filled dungeons and deep into uncharted wilderness in search of the cure for a cursed plague ravaging the city of Neverwinter. 
[b]Two expansion packs:[/b] 
[list][*]Shadows of Undrentide: Another adventure begins in Shadows of Undrentide! Charged by your master to recover four ancient artifacts, travel from the Silver Marches to unravel mysteries of a long-dead magical civilization. 
[*]Hordes of the Underdark: Continue the adventure started in Shadows of Undrentide and journey into the ever-more bizarre and hostile depths of Undermountain to challenge a gathering evil.[/list]
[b]Three premium modules:[/b] 
Discover over 40 hours of new stories, then go on to sample the hundreds of modules created by community members just like you.
[list][*]Kingmaker 
[*]ShadowGuard
[*]Witch’s Wake [/list]
[b]The Aurora Toolset:[/b] Build your own world full of unique monsters, items, traps, encounters, and settings, then share your creation with the rest of the Neverwinter Nights community. (Windows only)
[b]Dungeon Master Client: [/b]Become the storyteller! Control monsters, creatures, and characters your players will meet over the course of an adventure.
data.strSnippet: Return to the Forgotten Realms in this bestselling Dungeons & Dragons roleplaying game. Combines all the content of Neverwinter Nights Diamond Edition with all-new enhanced features. Includes 100+ hours of award-winning adventures and the tools to create your own!
